item.title: 加拿大寻求与东南亚国家签订协议以实现贸易多样化
item.description: 加拿大最高外交官表示，加拿大正在寻求与东南亚国家敲定一项自由贸易协定，作为其拓展新市场的努力的一部分，以回应其邻国和最大贸易伙伴美国对其征收的高额关税。【原文：Canada is seeking to finalise a free trade deal with Southeast Asian nations as part of a push to expand into new markets, its top diplomat said, responding to the hefty tariffs imposed on it by the United States, its neighbour and largest trade partner.】

item.title: 意大利因涉嫌投资服务中的不公平行为对 Revolut 进行调查
item.description: 意大利竞争管理机构（AGCM）周四表示，已对英国金融科技巨头 Revolut 的一些部门展开调查，指控其在投资和银行服务方面存在不公平的商业行为。【原文：Italy's competition authority (AGCM) has opened a probe into some units of British financial technology giant Revolut for alleged unfair commercial practices related to its investment and banking services, the watchdog said on Thursday.】

item.title: 消息人士称，巴基斯坦希望罗斯福酒店重建计划估值达到 10 亿美元
item.description: 一位高级政府官员表示，巴基斯坦正在为其在纽约拥有的罗斯福酒店寻求至少 10 亿美元的估值，并准备在寻找重建合作伙伴的过程中放弃在曼哈顿黄金地段的少数股份。【原文：Pakistan is seeking a valuation of at least $1 billion for the Roosevelt Hotel it owns in New York and is ready to part with a minority stake in the prime Manhattan property as it scouts for a redevelopment partner, a senior government official said.】

item.title: 迪拜将首次推出由人工智能厨师经营的餐厅
item.description: 在迪拜，您的晚餐可能很快会配上源代码。【原文：In Dubai, your dinner might soon come with a side of source code.】

item.title: 迪斯尼与英国 ITV 达成联合流媒体协议
item.description: 美国娱乐巨头沃尔特-迪斯尼（Walt Disney）和英国广播公司ITV周四表示，双方将在各自的流媒体平台 "迪斯尼+"（Disney+）和 "ITVX"（ITVX）上播放对方的部分节目，以帮助吸引新的观众。【原文：U.S. entertainment giant Walt Disney and British broadcaster ITV will carry a selection of each other's shows on their respective streaming platforms, Disney+ and ITVX, to help attract new audiences, the companies said on Thursday.】

item.title: 由于欧洲市场需求增长，宝马集团第二季度销售额略有增长
item.description: 德国汽车制造商宝马周四公布，第二季度交付量略有增长，原因是欧洲需求的增长抵消了中国市场的下滑。【原文：German carmaker BMW reported a slight increase in second-quarter deliveries on Thursday, as growing demand in Europe offset a slump in China.】

item.title: 据天空新闻报道，Ulta Beauty 将收购英国零售连锁店 Space NK
item.description: 据天空新闻周四援引消息人士的话报道，美国化妆品零售商 Ulta Beauty 即将达成收购英国高街连锁店 Space NK 的交易。【原文：U.S. cosmetics retailer Ulta Beauty is on the verge of a deal to buy British high street chain Space NK, Sky News reported on Thursday, citing a source.】

item.title: 有报道称意大利费列罗公司接近收购 Froot Loops 制造商 WK Kellogg，该公司股价暴涨 50
item.description: WK Kellogg 公司的股价在周四的盘前交易中飙升了 50%，因为一位消息人士告诉路透社，费列罗-罗奇（Ferrero Rocher）背后的意大利糖果制造商正接近达成收购该公司的交易，从而将全球最知名的两家消费食品公司联合起来。【原文：WK Kellogg's shares soared 50% in premarket trading on Thursday after a source told Reuters the Italian candy maker behind Ferrero Rocher is nearing a deal to buy the firm, uniting two of the world's most recognizable consumer food companies.】

item.title: 欧洲电信公司反击欧盟放宽固定网络监管的计划
item.description: 据周四发表的一封公开信称，一个由欧洲较小电信公司组成的联盟公开反对欧盟放宽固网业务监管的计划。【原文：An alliance of smaller European telecoms companies has spoken out against EU plans for laxer regulation in the fixed network business, according to an open letter published on Thursday.】

item.title: 文件显示，在特朗普达成协议后，越南计划对非法转运实施新的惩罚措施
item.description: 路透社看到的文件显示，越南正准备采取更严厉的惩罚措施来打击贸易欺诈和非法转运货物的行为，并将检查重点放在中国产品上，以努力履行对华盛顿的承诺。【原文：Vietnam is preparing stricter penalties to crack down on trade fraud and the illegal transshipment of goods, and has focused its inspections on Chinese products as it tries to comply with commitments made to Washington, documents seen by Reuters show.】

item.title: 据《回声报》报道，英国将向法国欧洲通信卫星公司投资 1.63 亿欧元
item.description: 据《回声报》周四援引爱丽舍宫消息来源报道，英国将向法国卫星运营商欧洲通信卫星公司（Eutelsat）投资1.63亿欧元（1.4049亿英镑）。【原文：Britain will invest 163 million euros (140.49 million pounds) in French satellite operator Eutelsat , Les Echos reported on Thursday, citing an Elysee source, after a much bigger cash injection by France to help it compete with SpaceX's Starlink.】

item.title: 据彭博社报道，李泽楷的中国保险业扩张谈判在父亲出售港口计划的反弹中陷入僵局
item.description: 据彭博新闻社周四报道，亿万富翁李泽楷将其保险业务扩展到中国大陆的努力已被搁置，因为中国政府对其父李嘉诚将全球港口出售给美国贝莱德公司的计划反应激烈。【原文：Billionaire Richard Li's efforts to expand his insurance business into mainland China have been put on hold after Beijing reacted with fury to his father Li Ka-shing's plan to sell a suite of global ports to U.S. firm BlackRock , Bloomberg News reported on Thursday.】

item.title: 福特以低压燃油泵故障为由召回逾85万辆美国汽车
item.description: 美国国家公路交通安全管理局（U.S. National Highway Traffic Safety Administration）周四表示，由于低压燃油泵可能发生故障，导致发动机熄火，福特汽车公司将在美国召回850,318辆汽车。【原文：Ford Motor is recalling 850,318 vehicles in the U.S. as the low-pressure fuel pump may fail, which could result in an engine stall, the U.S. National Highway Traffic Safety Administration said on Thursday.】

item.title: 独家新闻被查封的为俄罗斯提供食品的美资公司计划转而为中国和朝鲜提供食品
item.description: 据路透社和熟悉内情的人士查阅的文件显示，一家为保障国内食品供应而被俄罗斯查封的美国罐头食品公司正计划通过向中国和朝鲜出口来提高日益减少的销售额。【原文：A U.S.-owned canned food company seized by Russia to safeguard domestic food supplies is planning to boost dwindling sales with exports to China and North Korea, according to documents reviewed by Reuters and people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 优衣库运营商 Fast Retailing 9 个月利润增长 12.2
item.description: 日本优衣库服装品牌所有者 Fast Retailing 周四公布，该公司九个月的营业利润增长了 12.2%。【原文：Japan's Fast Retailing , owner of the Uniqlo clothing brand, on Thursday posted a 12.2% rise in nine-month operating profit.】

item.title: 受海外便利店推动，日本 Seven & i 公司利润增长
item.description: 日本 Seven & i 控股公司周四称，受海外便利店业绩增长的推动，该公司 3 月至 5 月季度的营业利润增长了 9.7%，超过了分析师的预期。【原文：Japan's Seven & i Holdings said on Thursday operating profit rose 9.7%% in the March to May quarter, beating analyst estimates, boosted by stronger performance at its overseas convenience stores.】

item.title: Kyivstar 称，乌克兰将于 2026 年推出欧洲首个 Starlink 移动互联网
item.description: 乌克兰首席执行官奥莱克桑德尔-科马罗夫（Oleksandr Komarov）表示，当领先运营商 Kyivstar 于年底推出信息服务并在 2026 年中期推出移动卫星宽带时，乌克兰将成为首个提供 Starlink 移动服务的欧洲国家。【原文：Ukraine will become the first European nation to offer Starlink mobile services when leading operator Kyivstar launches messaging by year-end and mobile satellite broadband in mid-2026, Chief Executive Oleksandr Komarov said.】

item.title: WPP 启用微软高管罗斯重建广告集团
item.description: 英国广告集团 WPP 周四任命董事会成员辛迪-罗斯（Cindy Rose）为新任首席执行官，让这位微软公司的资深高管负责领导集团的复苏。【原文：Britain's WPP named board member Cindy Rose as its new chief executive on Thursday, tasking the senior Microsoft executive with leading its recovery a day after a major profit warning showed the scale of the challenge at the ad group.】

item.title: 新加坡贸易部长将在七月美国之行中讨论医药关税减让问题
item.description: 新加坡贸易部长甘金勇周四表示，他将于本月晚些时候访问美国，讨论对该国药品出口实行关税减让的问题，这也是限制贸易战对经济影响的努力之一。【原文：Singapore trade minister Gan Kim Yong will visit the United States later this month to discuss tariff concessions for the country's pharmaceutical exports, he said on Thursday, part of efforts to limit the economic impact of the trade war.】

item.title: 欧洲期待北欧太空竞赛减少对美国的依赖
item.description: 位于瑞典和挪威最北部的两个小型太空港正在争分夺秒地从欧洲大陆向太空发射首批卫星，因为该地区希望减少对美国参与者的依赖。【原文：Two small spaceports in the far north of Sweden and Norway are racing to launch the first satellites from mainland Europe into space as the region looks to reduce its reliance on U.S. players.】

item.title: 投资者寻找欧洲收益能抵御关税动荡的迹象
item.description: 欧洲投资者正在为关键的第二季度财报季做好准备，这可能是首次有意义地深入了解企业如何应对贸易波动的新时代，更关键的是，它们的股价弹性如何。【原文：European investors are bracing for a pivotal second-quarter earnings season, which could offer the first meaningful insight into how companies are navigating a new era of trade volatility and, crucially, how resilient their share prices remain.】

item.title: 日本央行认为美国加征关税对出口的打击暂时有限，但警告称未来前景黯淡
item.description: 日本央行周四表示，美国关税对日本出口和产出的影响暂时有限，但许多公司担心未来全球需求疲软的风险。【原文：The impact of U.S. tariffs on Japan's exports and output was limited for now, but many companies worried about the risk of weaking global demand ahead, the central bank said on Thursday.】

item.title: 斯里兰卡服装业对美国征收 30% 的关税感到震惊，希望美国能削减关税
item.description: 一个顶级行业机构周四警告说，如果斯里兰卡无法争取到低于美国总统唐纳德-特朗普对来自科伦坡的进口商品征收的 30% 的关税，那么斯里兰卡的服装行业将面临困境。【原文：Distress is in store for Sri Lanka's garments sector if the island nation is unable to clinch a tariff lower than the 30% figure U.S. President Donald Trump has clamped on imports from Colombo, a top industry body warned on Thursday.】

item.title: 台积电第二季度销售额同比增长 38.6%，超出预期
item.description: 全球最大的合约芯片制造商台积电周四公布，第二季度营收为 9338.0 亿新台币（约合 319 亿美元），超过市场预期，原因是人工智能应用领域对该公司产品的需求激增。【原文：TSMC , the world's largest contract chipmaker, reported on Thursday second-quarter revenue of T$933.80 billion ($31.9 billion), beating market forecasts, as demand for the company's products leaps on surging interest in artificial intelligence applications.】

item.title: 据彭博新闻社报道，Blackstone 和 L&G 建立了高达 200 亿美元的私人信贷合作关系
item.description: 彭博新闻社周四援引 Blackstone 发言人的话报道称，Blackstone 已与 Legal & General 建立私人信贷合作关系，两家公司计划在未来五年内将合作规模扩大至 200 亿美元。【原文：Blackstone has entered into a private credit partnership with Legal & General that the two firms plan to expand to up to $20 billion over the next five years, Bloomberg News reported on Thursday, citing a Blackstone spokesperson.】

item.title: 据英国《金融时报》报道，亚马逊考虑再向 Anthropic 投资数十亿美元
item.description: 英国《金融时报》周四援引知情人士的话报道，亚马逊正在考虑向人工智能公司 Anthropic 再投资数十亿美元，以加强双方的战略合作伙伴关系。【原文：Amazon is considering another multibillion-dollar investment in AI firm Anthropic to strengthen their strategic partnership, the Financial Times reported on Thursday, citing people with knowledge of the talks.】

item.title: 早间竞价特朗普加征关税并未激起市场波澜
item.description: Rae Wee 对欧洲和全球市场未来一天的展望【原文：A look at the day ahead in European and global markets from Rae Wee】

item.title: 中国汽车制造商的价格战和产能过剩损害了财务状况
item.description: 中国汽车行业正因产能过剩和持续的价格战而陷入困境，这引起了监管机构和行业高管的警觉，他们警告说，这场动荡正在损害该行业的长期生存能力。【原文：China’s auto sector is reeling from overcapacity and an extended price war, raising alarm among regulators and industry executives who warn the turmoil is undermining the sector's long-term viability.】

item.title: 阿联酋公司 G42 计划在越南建造价值 20 亿美元的超大规模数据中心
item.description: 据越南国家媒体周四报道，阿布扎比国家支持的 G42 公司计划与越南公司合作，在越南商业中心胡志明市开发一个价值 20 亿美元的超大规模数据中心。【原文：The Abu Dhabi state-backed firm G42 plans to partner with Vietnamese companies to develop a $2 billion hyperscale data centre in Vietnam's business hub Ho Chi Minh City, state media reported on Thursday.】

item.title: 行业电子游戏演员与工作室通过人工智能安全协议
item.description: 演员工会 SAG-AFTRA 在一份新闻稿中说，好莱坞视频游戏配音和动作捕捉演员周三与视频游戏工作室签署了一份新合同，重点是人工智能保护，从而结束了长达近一年的罢工。【原文：Hollywood video game voice and motion capture actors signed a new contract with video game studios on Wednesday with a focus on artificial intelligence protections, the actors' union, SAG-AFTRA, said in a press release, ending a near year-long strike.】
